msbt.message: The sky is alive with shooting stars ! I can't look away or I might miss one!
I've been staring up at the night sky so I wouldn't miss a single shooting star, butmy poor aching neck!
I've been so entranced by this meteor shower, I've forgotten to wish on even one star!
Seeing a rainbow makes me happy. But seeing one with someone at my side makes me doubly happy.
What a lovely rainbow All my little worries have just disappeared, .
A rainbow is like an exquisitely wrapped present from the sky.
Today must be our lucky day! Getting to see a double rainbow is like winning a lottery in the sky.
A double rainbow How beautifulWhen such a rare thing happens, I can't help but wonder if it might be some kind of omen!
A double rainbow My eyes are in love with the sky right now, darling. I simply can't look away!
Just look at that shimmering aurora! It's like the winter sky has put on its finest gown, .
The night sky has wrapped itself in a veil of light What I wouldn't give to wear something so gorgeous!
Without the dark night sky, the bright beauty of the aurora wouldn't stand out. They make a perfect pair!
I wonder where the plane that left that vapor trail went to? What island did it visit?
A sharp vapor trail drawn across a blue expanse The sky looks like a piece of modern art, yes?
Something about seeing a vapor trail in the sky makes me long to go on a trip.
I confess, I'm terribly jealous of the moon. Not only is she gorgeous, she's always hanging out with stars!
The bright light of the full moon can't compete with the sun's brilliant glow. But at least I can look right at it!
A full moon makes a late-night stroll something truly special, don't you think? It's a gift the sky gives us each and every month, .
